member.name: T:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for ConnectionStringSettings.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.Connection(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Creates and returns a new DbConnection for the connection string.
member.param: The ConnectionStringSettings containing the connection string.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.As``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Creates and returns a new DbConnection for the connection string and implments the given interface.
member.typeparam: The interface to implement on the connection.
member.param: The ConnectionStringSettings containing the connection string.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.AsParallel``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Creates and returns a new multi-threaded connection implementing the given interface. The object can support making multiple calls at the same time.
member.typeparam: The interface to implement on the connection.
member.param: The ConnectionStringSettings containing the connection string.
member.returns: A closed connection that implements the given interface.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.Open(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Opens and returns a database connection.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.OpenAsync(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Opens and returns a database connection.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.
The cancellation token to use for the operation.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.OpenAs``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Opens and returns a database connection implementing a given interface.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.OpenAsAsync``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Asynchronously opens and returns a database connection implementing a given interface.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.
The cancellation token to use for the operation.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.OpenWithTransaction(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Opens a database connection and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.param: The settings for the connection.
member.returns: A wrapper for the database connection.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.OpenWithTransactionAsync(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a database connection and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.param: The settings for the connection.
The cancellation token to use for the operation.
member.returns: A task returning a connection when the connection has been opened.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.OpenWithTransactionAs``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Opens a database connection implementing a given interface and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.param: The settings for the connection.
member.returns: A wrapper for the database connection.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.OpenWithTransactionAsAsync``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a database connection implementing a given interface, and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.param: The settings for the connection.
The cancellation token to use for the operation.
member.returns: A task returning a connection when the connection has been opened.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.Dynamic(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Converts the connection to a connection that can be invoked dynamically to return lists of FastExpando.
member.param: The connection to use.
member.returns: A DynamicConnection using the given connection.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.ConnectionStringSettingsExtensions.Dynamic``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Converts the connection to a connection that can be invoked dynamically to return lists of type T.
member.param: The connection to use.
member.typeparam: The type of object to return from queries.
member.returns: A DynamicConnection using the given connection.

member.name: T:Insight.Database.Reliable.ReliableConnectionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for Reliable Connections.

member.summary: Creates and returns a new SqlConnection.
member.param: The ConnectionStringSettings containing the connection string.

member.summary: Opens and returns a database connection.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.Reliable.ReliableConnectionExtensions.ReliableDynamic``1(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings)
member.summary: Converts the connection to a connection that can be invoked dynamically to return lists of type T.
member.param: The connection to use.
member.typeparam: The type of object to return from queries.
member.returns: A DynamicConnection using the given connection.
